description: Try our easy to follow Quiche Lorraine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Quiche,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Quiche Lorraine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour into a bowl with pinch of salt. Add butter and rub into flour until like breadcrumbs. Combine juice with 11/2 tbs cold water, add to flour mix and stir until pastry starts to form. Press mixture together using your hands. Turn out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently until smooth.
Roll pastry out until large enough to line a 23cm fluted tart tin with removable base. Line tin with pastry pressing well into the corners and sides. Freeze for 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 200°C. Fry bacon in a frying pan for 5 minutes or until crisp. Spread over pastry base with cheese. Whisk eggs, flour, nutmeg, cream and milk together and season with pepper. Stir in melted butter.

Place quiche tin onto a baking tray. Pour filling over bacon and cheese. Bake for 10 minutes. Reduce temperature to 180°C and cook for 20 minutes or until set. Cut into wedges and garnish with herb leaves.
